title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook ground beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Serve over cooked spaghetti.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Saute onions, add curry powder. Add chicken, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Assemble tacos with cooked ground beef, diced tomato, shredded lettuce, and cheese in tortillas.

title: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in hot water until softened. Stir-fry shrimp, tofu, and garlic. Add soaked noodles, bean sprouts, and beaten egg. Mix in soy sauce and crushed peanuts.
